author: Tom O'Connor
title: Syria's Civil War Comes to Ukraine as Rival Sides Sign Up to Fight Abroad
description: "They see it as a chance to build a future, some people for the money, others think they can start a life there," one source in Syria told Newsweek.
content: The violence of Syria's civil war, about to enter its 11th year, may now unfold hundreds of miles and a continent away, as fighters for and against Ukraine's government are poised to join the fight oâ€¦ [+15452 chars]
